title: Ninety-two percent of organizations think they need to do more to reassure customers about how their data is used in AI
description: Cisco’s 2023 Data Privacy Benchmark Study reveals that to build trust, organizations focus primarily on compliance, whereas consumers value transparency most. 92% of respondents say their organization needs to do more to reassure customers about how their data is used in AI.
